name: EmailFileAttachment

fields.name: body
fields.description: Gets or sets the attachment itself.

fields.name: contenttype
fields.description: Gets or sets the attachment's Content-Type.

fields.name: filename
fields.description: Gets or sets the name of the file to attach.

constructors.name: EmailFileAttachment
constructors.description: Creates a new instance of the Messaging.EmailFileAttachment class.

description: EmailFileAttachment is used in SingleEmailMessage to specify attachments passed in as part of the request, as opposed to existing documents in Salesforce.
